title: She’s Sending It: Inside Kate Courtney’s Decision to Pivot from Factory Racer to Privateer
content:
And no, the 2018 XCO world champ is not racing gravel; rather, she plans to be back on the podium in the World Cups with a long-range goal of the 2028 LA Olympics.

Read the full article at She’s Sending It: Inside Kate Courtney’s Decision to Pivot from Factory Racer to Privateer on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
